    • Constructor Detail

      • Enemy

        public Enemy(city.cs.engine.World world,
             Player PLAYER,
             city.cs.engine.Body leftWall,
             city.cs.engine.Body rightWall)
        Constructor of the Enemy class. Adds the image, creates the fixture and sets the friction of the enemy and makes it move to the right.
        Parameters:
        world - The current level.
        PLAYER - The player in the level.
        leftWall - The left wall to collide with.
        rightWall - The right wall to collide with.

    • Method Detail

      • collide

        public void collide(city.cs.engine.CollisionEvent e)
        Checks for collision with a player, left wall and a right wall. If collided with player, destroy the player. If collision with the left wall or right wall, move right and move left respectively.
        Specified by:
        collide in interface city.cs.engine.CollisionListener
        Parameters:
        e -
